meanings.sent1: Dick is a common name for boys.
meanings.sent3: Dick always makes me think of my friend.
meanings.sent4: When I hear the name Dick, I remember my buddy.
meanings.sent5: I can't forget Dick's name because it's so simple.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a penis.
meanings.sent1: He got hit in the dick during the game.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined his dick during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: He joked about his dick being a troublemaker.
meanings.sent4: His dick was like a soldier standing tall.
meanings.sent5: The image of his dick stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a foolish or contemptible person.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a dick and ruin the fun.
meanings.sent2: He acted like a real dick at the party.
meanings.sent3: His behavior was so dickish, it was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent4: Being a dick won't get you any friends.
meanings.sent5: He was such a dick that no one wanted to be around him.
